name: Duelist Mod
description:
A Slay the Spire adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh!

SOURCE
 https://github.com/adambennett/StS-DuelistMod 

PATCH NOTES
v1.203.10
- Increased Exodia power damage
- Increased number of cards Phoenix Feather discards when upgraded, increased the cost to 1
- Moved Corruption from random buff pool to random debuff pool
- Balancing changes for: Superheavy Brawler, Superheavy Benkei, Superheavy Swordsman, Superheavy Ogre
- Changed 7-Colored Fish's summon variable to not be the magic number, which keeps it from being affected by negative effects
- Reinforcements cost increase to 1
- Polymerization and Mini-Polymerization now both use the Resummon keyword (no tribute costs)
- Fixed Molten Zombie damage upgrade
- Updated/changed various card text inconsistencies


Thanks for playing the Duelist! Please let me know if you have any feedback or bug reports!
Email: nyoxidestsmods@gmail.com
Discord: Nyoxide#3464
